CustomField.description: This formula fields user to display Product Certificate Type into multi-line.
CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Product_Certificate_Type__c , "Field Operations and Harvesting Harmonized Food Safety Standard"), "Field Operations and Harvesting Harmonized Food Safety Standard"+BR(), NULL)& IF(INCLUDES(Product_Certificate_Type__c , "Post Operations Harmonized Food Safety Standard"), "Post Operations Harmonized Food Safety Standard"+BR(), NULL)& IF(INCLUDES(Product_Certificate_Type__c , "Storage & Distribution"), "Storage & Distribution"+BR(), NULL)& IF(INCLUDES(Product_Certificate_Type__c , "Dietary Supplements"), "Dietary Supplements"+BR(), NULL)& IF(INCLUDES(Product_Certificate_Type__c , "Food Manufacturing"), "Food Manufacturing"+BR(), NULL)& IF(INCLUDES(Product_Certificate_Type__c , "Food Packaging"), "Food Packaging"+BR(), NULL)& IF(INCLUDES(Product_Certificate_Type__c , "Primary Animal"), "Primary Animal"+BR(), NULL)& IF(INCLUDES(Product_Certificate_Type__c , "Animal Product"), "Animal Product"+BR(), NULL)& IF(INCLUDES(Product_Certificate_Type__c , "Primary Plant"), "Primary Plant"+BR(), NULL)& IF(INCLUDES(Product_Certificate_Type__c , "Intermediate"), "Intermediate"+BR(), NULL)& IF(INCLUDES(Product_Certificate_Type__c , "Animal Feed"), "Animal Feed"+BR(), NULL)& IF(INCLUDES(Product_Certificate_Type__c , "Pet Food"), "Pet Food"+BR(), NULL)& IF(INCLUDES(Product_Certificate_Type__c , "Basic"), "Basic", NULL)
CustomField.label: Product Certificate Type Formula
